lead_paragraph: The actor, 74, is best known for his roles in the British comedy troupe and as a director or writer of works like “Life of Brian” and “Monty Python and the Holy Grail.”

headline.print_headline: Monty Python Member Said to Have Dementia
headline.main: Terry Jones of Monty Python Has Dementia, His Family Says

snippet: The actor, 74, is best known for his roles in the British comedy troupe and as a director or writer of works like “Life of Brian” and “Monty Python and the Holy Grail.”...
abstract: Terry Jones, founding member of comedy troupe Monty Python, is reported to have rare form of dementia that affects his ability to communicate; is named by British Academy of Film and Television Arts in Wales for Outstanding Contribution to Film and Television award.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: British Academy of Film and Television
